message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to pay $900000.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1050000 is still a bit higher than I can comfortably spend.  I'm willing to go up to $1000000. This is my final offer.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid $1000000 is still a bit short of what I'm looking for. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
